headline.print_headline: Chipotle Critic Turns Up Heat With 'Chubby Chipotle' Ad
headline.main: Chipotle Critic Turns Up Heat With 'Chubby Chipotle' Ad

docs.lead_paragraph: Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc, known for its indulgent burritos, is battling a "Chubby Chipotle" ad campaign from the food industry group whose "Nanny" ads helped sink New York City's ban on super-sized sugary drinks.
docs.snippet: Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc, known for its indulgent burritos, is battling a "Chubby Chipotle" ad campaign from the food industry group whose "Nanny" ads helped sink New York City's ban on super-sized sugary drinks.

headline.main: The Ring Cycle: Boxing’s Eternal Cinematic Appeal

docs.abstract: Several new boxing movies all feature same satisfying narrative arc of physical and mental despair and redemption as defined through the highly masculine sport.
docs.lead_paragraph: Trends come and go. Technology is ever-changing. But as a new spate of films prove, boxing movies are here to stay.
docs.snippet: Trends come and go. Technology is ever-changing. But as a new spate of films prove, boxing movies are here to stay.

headline.print_headline: Young at Heart? Not Most Americans, Government Report Says
headline.main: Young at Heart? Not Most Americans, Government Report Says

docs.lead_paragraph: Your heart might be older than you are. A new government report suggests age is just a number — and perhaps not a very telling one when it comes to your risk of heart attack or stroke.
docs.snippet: Your heart might be older than you are. A new government report suggests age is just a number — and perhaps not a very telling one when it comes to your risk of heart attack or stroke.

headline.main: Should Schools Give Students ‘Body’ Report Cards?

docs.abstract: Have you ever received a letter or report card from your school telling you your B.M.I., or body mass index?
docs.snippet: Have you ever received a letter or report card from your school telling you your B.M.I., or body mass index?

headline.print_headline: Obese at 50? Midlife Weight May Affect When Alzheimer's Hits
headline.main: Obese at 50? Midlife Weight May Affect When Alzheimer's Hits

docs.lead_paragraph: One more reason to watch the waistline: New research says people's weight in middle age may influence not just whether they go on to develop Alzheimer's disease, but when.
docs.snippet: One more reason to watch the waistline: New research says people's weight in middle age may influence not just whether they go on to develop Alzheimer's disease, but when.
